channel.title: Get Started on
channel.description: Recent content in Get Started on

item.title: üêà Meet CutieCat
item.description: ‚ù§Ô∏è If you have a v0 CutieCat, you're an early supporter of the project! Your feedback & suggestions are cherished. What is the CutieCat? # CutieCat is your new hacking & prototyping companion! It’s a cat-shaped console that lets you experiment with USB Attacks, Wireless Hacking, and fun mini-projects in CircuitPython. Our CutieCat add-ons will get you building prototypes in no time! CutieCat Features # CutieCat is built around the ESP32, a WiFi & Bluetooth capable microcontroller that makes it perfect for low-cost wireless hacks!

item.title: ‚öíÔ∏è Assembly Guide
item.description: ‚ö†Ô∏è Updated pics & assembly video coming by Sep 06 2024. ‚öô Parts # Part Description Microcontroller ESP32-S3 WiFi & Bluetooth MCU Screen 128x64px SH1106 OLED Display Pin Header 6 Pin Breakout for CutieCat Add-ons Antenna (Patch) Omni Antenna Antenna (External) Long-range Antenna ‚ÑπÔ∏è Learn more about component selection on our hardware guide. üóí Steps # 1. Place the ESP32 # a. Melt a tack of solder onto the top right pad.

item.title: üñ•Ô∏è Firmware Guide
item.description: ‚ÑπÔ∏è Our firmware is currently experimental as we continue to explore & make improvements to the DevKitty ecosystem. CutieCat comes flashed with QA Firmware to test basic functionality. To start hacking you’ll have to load new firmware. If you’re adventurous you can even learn to write your own! üíª Firmware Guide # ‚ÑπÔ∏è Pick a firmware, and keep reading to learn how to flash these projects. Official Firmware # We’re constantly adding new features and developing cool hacking tools for the ESP32.

item.title: üë®‚Äçüíª Developer Guide
item.description: ‚ÑπÔ∏è This page is under construction. Hardware # Currently not accepting PR’s, but fixes & suggestions are welcome! PCB: Designed in KiCAD Enclosure: Designed in FreeCAD Firmware # ‚ÑπÔ∏è Coming soon Tools # ESPTool # ESPTool is the official tool for managing Espressif chips. It can identify boards, modify flash space, and more! Install ESPTool # pip3 install esptool.py Create a Binary # After developing and writing custom firmware to the ESP32, you may wish to extract a fullsize binary that contains your application, and perhaps files on the flash space.
